verses.1: Pasian aw, nangma thutang, kumpipa hilh inla, nangma thuman, kumpi tapa hilh in.
verses.2: Amah in thumanna tawh na mite tungah thu khen henla, na mizawngte tungah thu a tangin khen tahen.
verses.3: Mual liante le mual neute in thumanna tawh na mite adingin nopna tampi piangsak tahen.
verses.4: Amah in mizawngte ading thu a manin khen henla, mi cimawhte tungah suahtakna pia-in, midang a nengniamte sucip gawp tahen.
verses.5: Ni le kha a om lai teng, khang tawntungin amah hing tahen.
verses.6: Amah pen pawn lak lopa tungah a kia guah, lei a kawtsak guahzu tawh kibang tahen.
verses.7: Ama hun sungin thuman pung henla, khapi a bei mateng nopna om tahen.
verses.8: Ama ukna, tuipi khat pan tuipi khat, Gunpi panin leimong dongin om tawntung tahen.
verses.9: Ama galte khempeuh ama mai ah kun uh henla, amah a langpangte leilak kidenna uh hen.
verses.10: Tarshish kumpite le tuikulh neu-a kumpite in ama tungah siah pia uh henla, Sheba le Seba kumpite in letsong puak ta uh hen.
verses.11: Kumpi khempeuh ama mai ah bok uh henla, minam khempeuh in ama na sem ta uh hen.
verses.12: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi cimawhte in a koh ciangin amah in hon khia a, mizawng, a huh ding a om lote amah in a hon khia hi.
verses.13: A thakiam, a cimawh mite amah in hehpih a, mi cimawhteʼ nuntakna amah in a hon khia hi.
verses.14: Amah in amaute pammaih sa ahih manin netniamna le ngong hihna panin amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.15: Amah a khansau henla, Sheba gam a khamte ama tungah kipia tahen. Ama adingin thu kingetsak tawntung henla, sun thapai-in ama adingin thupha kingetsak tahen.
verses.16: Gam sung khempeuh ah an tampi tak piang henla, mual liante dawnah dim mema-in Lebanon gam hoih sung bang ta henla, gamlak a lopate bangin khuapite sunga om mite pung ta uh hen.
verses.17: Ama min kip tawntung henla, a minthanna kip paisuak hen. Ama hangin mite in thupha ngah henla, minam khempeuh in amah pen thupha ngah pa, ci ta uh hen.
verses.18: Na lamdangte a bawl amah bek ahi Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen.
verses.19: A minthang ama min in thupha ngah tawntung henla, ama minthanna tawh leitung khempeuh kidim tahen. Amen! Amen!
verses.20: Jessiʼ tapa Davidʼ thungetnate a bei ta ahi hi.
